backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping project features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality and purpose of all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind layer defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode variants, and global background/text assignments.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file containing the root div and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main component that composes the Hero, Love Letter, Memories, Reasons, Closing, and Footer sections.
frontend/src/components/valentine/CardSu: Reusable card container applying padding, styling classes, and optional hover animation.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Closin: Cream-themed closing section with quote, decorative hearts, and the required signature 'by vkayyy'.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Footer: Footer showing copyright year and link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/valentine/HeroSe: Hero section with floating hearts, romantic heading, subtitle, and entry animation.
frontend/src/components/valentine/LoveLe: Wine-themed editable love letter section with preview mode and copy‑to‑clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Memori: Cream-themed section managing a dynamic list of memory cards with add, update, and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Memory: Interactive card for viewing, editing, copying, and pasting memories including optional images.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Reason: Displays a themed section listing reasons for love using icons and fade‑in effects.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Sectio: Layout wrapper providing wine or cream themed background sections with pattern overlays.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useClipboardCopy.ts: Provides a helper to copy text to the clipboard with simple success/error status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and persistence via an AuthClient provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useInViewFade.ts: IntersectionObserver‑based hook that reports when an element enters view for fade‑in animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning an empty query set since no backend queries are defined.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom Valentine‑themed color variables, typography, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider, then mounts the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and theme settings for the project.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s visual direction, required images, and feature list for a romantic Valentine’s Day single‑page website with themed sections and animations. Contains project metadata, architectural notes, and existing implemented features.
